item.title: Blocked footpath, 7th September
item.description:
Footpath from the A435 starts off okay but then passes a derelict property for sale and as the path should go up the hill to the road it's totally overgrown and not possible to pass through. Therefore, the only option is to retreat back to the main road and take one of the alternative footpaths nearby.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elkstone, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed restriction has not been removed post works, 7th September
item.description:
The b4063 was Subjected to a temporary 30mph limit and speed cameras in 2022 to protect the workforce of the cycle path. This work has been completed yet the 30mph limit remains in place despite absolutely no indication it is appropriate. When will the original limit be restored?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven Road Surface, 7th September
item.description:
Warning sign urgently required as the road surface is significantly uneven due to road slump which now extends to both sides of the road. Cyclist and motorbikes are particularly at risk, as the camber throws you one way and then the other.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Location is West Down Carpark - Flytipping, 7th September
item.description:
A quantity of Bicycle parts, metal seat frame and wood has been flytipped at the West Down Carpark at the far end of Cleeve Common. The WHAT3WORDS location is:- reflected.shoppers.encoded. Please can this be removed as soon as possible so as not to attract further tips.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Lane, Sevenhampton, Cotswold
